params_before._comment: Core confluence requirements (relaxed to allow more candidates for quality scoring)
params_before._comment_volume: Volume confirmation - critical for confirming institutional interest
params_before._comment_rsi: RSI range filter - avoid extreme overbought/oversold (optional)
params_before._comment_ema: EMA alignment filters (disabled - using new indicators instead)
params_before._comment_macd: MACD confirmation (disabled - Stochastic is better for day trading)
params_before._comment_ribbon: Ribbon filters (optional - can enable for ultra-selective mode)
params_before._stochastic_note: Filters out entries at extremes: no longs if >80, no shorts if <20
params_before._bollinger_note: Confirms volatility expansion and price position relative to bands
params_before._vwap_note: MUST be above VWAP for longs, below for shorts - no exceptions
params_before._comment_quality: Quality Score System - Ensures only best 2-3 trades per day
params_before._quality_note: Adjust min_quality_score: 75-80 = fewer trades, 60-65 = more trades
